<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d2fd926089a58d482fb67a362e11bad">createStringError</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a59739a4f15fb2ec57a6b7fcfe938546baafdb5594dc3e484fc1bfd7c564d550c1">errc::not&#95;enough&#95;memory</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;failed to allocate memory buffer of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine/#acaa1b3e2d07a6c9d2d7030c7dc7ec6a7">Twine::utohexstr</a>(FileSize) + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; bytes&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  writeHeaders();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  writeSections();</span></CodeLine>
